title: Poland Retail Sales MoM
description: Retail Sales in Poland increased 1.40 percent in September of 2022 over the previous month. Retail Sales MoM in Poland averaged 0.40 percent from 2000 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 10.60 percent in May of 2020 and a record low of -10.90 percent in May of 2004. In Poland, the Retail sales report provides an aggregated measure of sales of retail goods and services over a specific time period. In Poland, Retail sales are seasonal, volatile and relatively important to the overall economy. This page provides - Poland Retail Sales MoM - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: EUROSTAT
